overview: Szczepan Zadra lives in Sweden. A Pole by origin, he maintains contacts with the country. He works as a representative of an international transport company. Meanwhile, the Polish militia receives signals that valuable icons have been smuggled into Sweden for some time. Szczepan meets Agata, a girl who is on business in Sweden. Agata is doing the Warsaw antiquarian a favor by bringing a small package to Stockholm. Doesn't realize it contains a valuable icon.
title: Prom do Szwecji
